nodes.text: The MK-1 Hazard Droid was a type of battle droid produced by the Colicoid species during the era of the Galactic War. A number of MK-1 Hazard Droids and the later models were deployed during the Colicoids' war games.
MK-1 Hazard Droids appear as enemies in the Flashpoint "Colicoid War Game" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
